com.mumfrey.liteloader

Interface Permissible

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Exposable, Listener, LiteMod
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PermissibleAllMods

    public interface Permissible
extends LiteMod
    Interface for mods which use the ClientPermissions system
    Author:
    Adam Mummery-Smith

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getPermissibleModName()
      Returns the node name of the mod, replicated permissions will be of the form mod.
      float getPermissibleModVersion()
      The mod version to replicate to the server
      void onPermissionsChanged(PermissionsManager manager)
      Called when the permissions are changed (eg. when new permissions are received from the server)
      void onPermissionsCleared(PermissionsManager manager)
      Called when the permissions set is cleared
      void registerPermissions(PermissionsManagerClient permissionsManager)
      Called by the permissions manager at initialisation to instruct the mod to populate the list of permissions it supports.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.mumfrey.liteloader.LiteMod

        getVersion, init, upgradeSettings

      • Methods inherited from interface com.mumfrey.liteloader.api.Listener

        getName

    • Method Detail

      • getPermissibleModName

        java.lang.String getPermissibleModName()
        Returns the node name of the mod, replicated permissions will be of the form mod..permission.node so this method must return a valid name for use in permission nodes. This method must also return the same value every time it is called since permissible names are not necessarily cached.
        Returns:
        Permissible name

      • getPermissibleModVersion

        float getPermissibleModVersion()
        The mod version to replicate to the server
        Returns:
        Mod version as a float

      • registerPermissions

        void registerPermissions(PermissionsManagerClient permissionsManager)
        Called by the permissions manager at initialisation to instruct the mod to populate the list of permissions it supports. This method should call back against the supplied permissions manager to register the permissions to be sent to the server when connecting.
        Parameters:
        permissionsManager - Client permissions manager

      • onPermissionsCleared

        void onPermissionsCleared(PermissionsManager manager)
        Called when the permissions set is cleared
        Parameters:
        manager -

      • onPermissionsChanged

        void onPermissionsChanged(PermissionsManager manager)
        Called when the permissions are changed (eg. when new permissions are received from the server)
        Parameters:
        manager -
